Plot: Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.
Title: Backdraft
Actors: Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, Robert De Niro, Donald Sutherland
tomatoConsensus: It's not particularly deep, but Backdraft is a strong action movie with exceptional special effects.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
